core.text: The SBTCVM Command Shell is an important part of SBTCVM. Though it can be daunting for new users to get a grasp on. In this tutorial, You will be guided through the most key parts of the command shell. The Command shell, when properly run from a terminal, will print out some text like above. Now. lets get you stared. To run the command shell. simply run MK2-CS.py in a terminal. This will vary depending on your operating system. So check the internet for information on how to do this in your operating system.
SBTCVM MK2-CS Command Shell v2.?.? ready. :
